description:
Cbus is a leading industry superannuation provider for members of the building, construction and allied industries, as well as 

their families and employers. With over 750,000 members and 125,000 employers, Cbus’ success is attributed to its fundamental commitment to member services, and not shareholder profits. Being a cut above the rest, Cbus prides itself on its ability to give back to our members through our innovative integrated service model and leading referral service through Cbus’ partnership with the Financial Planning Association (FPA) of Australia. 

Cbus is genuinely committed to delivering workplace diversity, inclusion and flexible working arrangements as an enabler of our purpose - to act in the best interest of our members and maximise their retirement outcomes.

We encourage both full-time and part-time applicants to apply for roles at Cbus, in addition to those applicants who may be seeking flexible working arrangements.
